name: ModernTherapy
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: modern therapy
des:
Are life's complex problems bogging you down? Are you looking for a wise, brilliant, and experienced adviser to guide you to some life-changing solutions?

Well, look no further! I am here to help you work through whatever may be bothering you. Whether it's a problem in your romance, within your family, at work, or whatever else life has so graciously thrown at you - I'm all ears. Just answer "yes" or "no" to my questions, as I'll get to the root of the problem and offer you some incredibly original advice. You're bound to leave this session refreshed and enlightened, ready to resolve whatever issue brought you to the therapy couch in the first place.

Just...don't take it too seriously.

DISCLAIMER:
This tool does not provide medical advice, and is for entertainment purposes only,
and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis.
Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical
emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
